abstract: Iranian revolutionary court convenes second hearing in espionage trial of Washington Post journalist Jason Rezaian, arrested and imprisoned in 2014.
lead_paragraph: An Iranian revolutionary court convened the second hearing on Monday in the espionage trial of Jason Rezaian, who was arrested and imprisoned nearly a year ago.

headline.main: Iran: Hearing Is Held in Reporter’s Trial
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Hearing Is Held in Reporter’s Trial
